attributes.review: When I opened the app and logged in, I heard a knock on the door, it was from the fbi. It was a package that said that I was being tracked via the Trump 2020 app, and I didn’t even put in my location. The next day i received another package that my dad opened, it had DRUGS in it, so I’m concluding the producers of the trump 2020 app( and Donald trump himself) ante just a bunch of no good drug dealers
attributes.title: FBI spying

attributes.review: 😔💕✨when i downloaded this app i immediately got so many viruses on my phone. My phone literally caught fire because it couldn’t handle the sight of donald trump. Not only that but this app included straight up fake news ! I can not believe this, unacceptable. This app needs to be removed, just like the man in office! ✨🧚🏽‍♀️😳😡👁👄👁

attributes.review:
When I downloaded this app I was excited 😜 to see my favorite Oompa Loompa 💕✨💅 but as soon as I opened the app my phone burst into flames 🔥 😱💕 then my whole family was processed through a meat grinder 😳💕 I am now an orphan and I’m writing ✍️ this review from my fridge 😓👀🤭 (p.s. attributes.review: If our president has the time to make a whole app then he has time to deal with the covid-19 crisis instead of going into hiding. Also why would we need this app when we can look on Trumps childish twitter page. Overall poorly made and waste valuable space on our phones.
attributes.title: Waste of time

attributes.review: When I got this app nothing was wrong with until I used it😡. When I was using this app they tracked down my home address and I had fbi come and take my son who was a girl😡. My dog who was a cat was arrested for making me download the app. But worst of all THIS TRUMP APP TOOK AWAY MY CHICKEN NUGGIES. do you know who offensive that is? As a American this behavior is not ok. THIS APP IS THE WORST NEVER DOWNLOAD IT😡😡😡👁👅👁😆😆👁👁🔫😍💅🏼🙂✋🏼😈🥶
